text: jin logon ne apane rab ka aamantran sveekaar kar liya, unake lie achchha puraskaar hai. rahe ve log jinhonne use sveekaar nahin kiya yadi unake paas vah sab kuchh ho jo dharatee mein hain, balki usake saath utana aur bhee ho to apanee mukti ke lie ve sab de daalen. vahee hain, jinaka bura hisaab hoga. unaka thikaana jahannam hai aur vah atyant bura vishraam-sthal hai
